forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early then becoming foggy. Low 9C. SSW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early then becoming foggy. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph, becoming NW and decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
